content.text:
# 32nd Saturn Awards

| most_nominations = Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith (10)
| last = 31st
| next = 33rd
}}
The 32nd Saturn Awards, honoring the best in science fiction, fantasy and horror film and television in 2005, were held on May 2, 2006 at the Universal City Hilton Hotel in Los Angeles. The host for the event was Jeffrey Ross.
The following is a complete list of nominees and winners. Winners are highlighted in boldface.
Winners and nominees
Film

|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Best Fantasy Film
|-
| valign="top" |

* Flightplan
* A History of Violence
* Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
* Mr. & Mrs. Smith
* Oldboy
* Red Eye
| valign="top" |
* Batman Begins
* Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
* The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
* Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
* King Kong
* Zathura: A Space Adventure
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Best Sci-Fi Film
|-
| valign="top" |

* Constantine
* Land of the Dead
* Saw II
* The Skeleton Key
* Wolf Creek
| valign="top" |
* Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith
* Fantastic Four

* The Jacket
* Serenity
* War of the Worlds

* George Lucas - Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith

* Steven Spielberg - War of the Worlds
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Best Actor
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Christopher Nolan & David S. Goyer - Batman Begins'

* Philippa Boyens, Fran Walsh, & Peter Jackson - King Kong
* Steve Kloves - Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

|-

|-

* Laura Linney - The Exorcism of Emily Rose as Erin Bruner

| valign="top" |
* 'Mickey Rourke - Sin City as Marv'
